channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Qualcomm backs SpotDraft to scale on-device contract AI with valuation doubling toward $400M
item.description: SpotDraft now processes over 1 million contracts annually using its AI tool, with contract volumes up 173% year-over-year.

item.title: Where Tech Leaders and Students Really Think AI Is Going
item.description: We asked tech CEOs, journalists, entertainers, students, and more about the promise and peril of artificial intelligence. Here’s what they said.

item.title: Southwest Airlines Says Bye to Open Seating—and Hello to Boarding Complexity
item.description: An airline’s boarding policy shake-up shows the limits of efficiency. (Spoiler: It’s money.)

item.title: He Leaked the Secrets of a Southeast Asian Scam Compound. Then He Had to Get Out Alive
item.description: A source trapped inside an industrial-scale scamming operation contacted me, determined to expose his captors’ crimes—and then escape. This is his sto...

item.title: Google pays $68M to settle claims its voice assistant spied on users
item.description: Google did not admit wrongdoing in the settlement of the class-action case, which accused the firm of "unlawful and intentional interception and recor...

item.title: Revealed: Leaked Chats Expose the Daily Life of a Scam Compound’s Enslaved Workforce
item.description: A whistleblower trapped inside a “pig butchering” scam compound gave WIRED a vast trove of its internal materials—including 4,200 pages of messages th...

item.title: ‘Among the worst we’ve seen’: report slams xAI’s Grok over child safety failures
item.description: “We assess a lot of AI chatbots at Common Sense Media, and they all have risks, but Grok is among the worst we’ve seen,” Robbie Torney of Common Sense...

item.title: Northwood Space secures a $100M Series B and a $50M Space Force contract
item.description: This is the El Segundo, California-based startup's second raise in less than a year.

item.title: 8 Best Laptops (2026), WIRED-Tested and Approved
item.description: Our expert team of laptop testers stand behind these Windows laptops, MacBooks, Chromebooks, and Linux portables.

item.title: South Korea’s Edenlux set for U.S. debut of eye-strain wellness device
item.description: Edenlux builds wearable tech to protect and train your eyes, inspired by its founder’s personal vision recovery.
